text.div:
English

Generated Narrative: ValueSet results-coded-values-laboratory-uv-ips

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in Results Blood Group - IPS
  • Import all the codes that are contained in Results Presence/Absence - IPS
  • Import all the codes that are contained in Results Microorganism - IPS

Gegenereerde narrative: ValueSet results-coded-values-laboratory-uv-ips

  • Importeer alle codes die staan in Results Blood Group - IPS
  • Importeer alle codes die staan in Results Presence/Absence - IPS
  • Importeer alle codes die staan in Results Microorganism - IPS

name: ResultsCodedValuesLaboratoryUvIps
title: Results Coded Values Laboratory - IPS
description: This value set is defined as the union of: (a) Blood group [Type]; (b) Presence/Absence Indicators (2.16.840.1.113883.11.22.52) (c) Microorganisms (2.16.840.1.113883.11.22.49)
